Name: Meat Madness
About the game: After a mining expedition gone awry, journey deep within a planet made of meat to save who you can. Your return trip is not guaranteed. Features a short, challenging first-person platforming experience with a horror narrative. As you meat with the survivors, the story unfolds... The story is text-driven and controllers are fully supported.
